item.title: 2023 Holiday DDoS Protection Guide
item.description:
Preface As the holiday season approaches, businesses and organizations should brace for an increase in Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks. Historically, this period has seen a spike in such attacks, targeting sectors like e-commerce and gaming that experience heightened activity. DDoS threats persist throughout the year, but the holiday season's unique combination of increased online activity and heightened cyber threats makes it a critical time for heightened vigilance.
